title: Suzuki Motorcycle launches Katana at Rs 13.6 lakh in India
description: Suzuki Motorcycle India Pvt. Ltd. (SMIPL), the two-wheeler subsidiary of Suzuki Motor Corporation, Japan today launched the KATANA in India. It be available at all the companyâ€™s Bike zone dealerships for INR 13,61,000/- (ex-showroom, Delhi) after 04 July 2022.
